alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 1:40AM PST until January 09 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Humboldt County, Southeastern Elko County, Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County, Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County, Southwest Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Areas of blowing snow and reduced visibility are expected.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
